column4: I have two machines on a LAN, one win32 one linux.  I set up a samba share that was working, then reinstalled everything on the win32 box.  now that box doesn't find the network neighborhood.  I know it's something stupid like setting up the...
...workgroup name, but I can't remember what to set it to.  where do i look?
use  the same workgroup name as what you use on your windows computers
if you're using windows XP on the other computers, it doesn't matter much
